msgSnippet: Simon, I believe you are experiencing the class loader problem that so many others (including me) have run across. Just search the archives of this mailing

Subject: RE: [junit] error in junit.swingui.TestRunner

From: Peter Spitz <pspitz@...>

Simon,
 
I believe you are experiencing the "class loader" problem that so many
others (including me) have run across. Just search the archives of this
mailing list for "xml parser" (without the quotation marks) and I think
you'll find what you need. There are several solutions; just pick the one
that works best for your situation.
 
Thanks,
Peter
 
Peter Spitz 
Team Leader/Senior Software Developer 
InSystems Technologies 
19 Allstate Parkway, Suite 400 
Markham, Ontario 
L3R 5A4  Canada

Fax: 905-513-1419 
<mailto:pspitz@...> 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Simon Evans
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: 6/21/2001 8:09 PM
Subject: [junit] error in junit.swingui.TestRunner

i have test cases and test suites that work fine with
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());

but when i try to use the swing one
junit.swingui.TestRunner.run(XMLValidationTest.class);

i get the exception
java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraints violated when linking
org/xml/sax/helpers/DefaultHandler class
 	at
com.simplydone.util.XMLValidator.validateSAX(XMLValidator.java:41)
 	at
com.simplydone.util.XMLValidator.validate(XMLValidator.java:32)
 	at
com.simplydone.httpunit.XMLValidationTest.testCorrectFiles(XMLValidation
Test
.java:35)
